targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "storageIOTable")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storageIONReadX")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["storageIODevice"], set: ${devices:json}))
  |> derivative()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)

numCpus = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "systemStats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ssCpuNumCpus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "host", "agent_host", "ssCpuNumCpus"])

stats = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "systemStats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ssCpuRawSystem" or r["_field"] == "ssCpuRawUser" or r["_field"] == "ssCpuRawWait")
  |> derivative()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "host", "agent_host", "ssCpuRawSystem", "ssCpuRawUser", "ssCpuRawWait"])

join(
    tables: { numCpus: numCpus, stats: stats },
    on: ["_time", "_start", "_stop"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    "ssCpuRawSystem": r["ssCpuRawSystem"] / float(v: r["ssCpuNumCpus"]),
    "ssCpuRawUser": r["ssCpuRawUser"] / float(v: r["ssCpuNumCpus"]),
    "ssCpuRawWait": r["ssCpuRawWait"] / float(v: r["ssCpuNumCpus"]),
  }))
  |> drop(columns: ["ssCpuNumCpus"])
SELECT mean("rxspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'PPPoE0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rxspeed") FROM "autogen"."interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'PPPoE1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rxspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'Wireguard0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rxspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'OpenVPN0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("txspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'PPPoE0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("txspeed") FROM "autogen"."interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'PPPoE1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("txspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'Wireguard0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("txspeed") FROM "interface stat" WHERE ("name"::tag = 'OpenVPN0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cpuload") as "CPU Usage" FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "ups")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upsEBatteryEstimatedChargeRemaining" or r["_field"] == "upsEPositiveBatteryVoltage" or r["_field"] == "upsESystemInputVoltage" or r["_field"] == "upsESystemOutputLoad" or r["_field"] == "upsESystemOutputVoltage") 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: 
        if r["_field"] == "upsEPositiveBatteryVoltage" then float(v: r._value) / 10.0 
        else if r["_field"] == "upsESystemInputVoltage" then float(v: r._value) / 10.0 
        else if r["_field"] == "upsESystemOutputVoltage" then float(v: r._value) / 10.0 
        else float(v: r._value),
      _field: r._field,
      _measurement: r._measurement
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upsLoad"  or r["_field"] == "upsInputVoltage" or r["_field"] == "upsBatteryVoltage"  or r["_field"] == "upsBatteryCharge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ups")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upsEBatteryEstimatedChargeRemaining" or r["_field"] == "upsEPositiveBatteryVoltage" or r["_field"] == "upsESystemInputVoltage" or r["_field"] == "upsESystemOutputLoad" or r["_field"] == "upsESystemOutputVoltage") 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: 
        if r["_field"] == "upsEPositiveBatteryVoltage" then float(v: r._value) / 10.0 
        else float(v: r._value),
      _field: r._field,
      _measurement: r._measurement
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "upsBatteryVoltage" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upsBatteryCharge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
